info.name: LaraCommerce API Copy
info.description:
## This documentation describes how to access the LaraCommerce API service

Contact Support:  
Email: [laracommerce12@gmail.com](mailto:laracommerce12@gmail.com) / muhammadhabibfery@gmail.com

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("Account has been successfully registered, please check your email to verify your account.");

response.name: Successfull operation
Unprocessable Content
Successfull operation
response.body:
{
    "code": 200,
    "message": "Logged in succesfully.",
    "data": {
        "id": 0,
        "name": "john lennon",
        "username": "john-lennon",
        "email": "johnlennon@beatles.com",
        "phone": "0812345678",
        "address": null,
        "avatar": null
    },
    "token": "randomToken"
}

Unprocessable content (Category not found)
Unprocessable Content (Duplicate of product's name)
Successfull operation
response.body:
{
    "code": 201,
    "message": "The product created successfully",
    "data": {
        "id": 0,
        "name": "Product 1",
        "slug": "product-1",
        "description": "lorem-ipsum",
        "price": 100000,
        "weight": 100,
        "stock": 3,
        "sold": 0
    }
}
